reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress flattering and comfortable, with a thick lycra material that provides a slimming effect. The dress fits well, with one customer noting it sits right above the knee, while another mentions it pulls in at the waist. They appreciate its great length and stretchiness, with one describing it as having a swimsuit-like feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Flattering, and Confidence-Boosting — I Bought Two!
items.body: This dress surprised me in the best way. The fabric is unbelievably soft — like, “I could sleep in this” soft — and the fit is so flattering that I ended up grabbing a second color immediately. Why I Love It: • Fits like a glove (in a good way!) I’m 5'5", 125 lbs, size 4 in pants, 36D, and the medium fits perfectly. It hugs in all the right places without feeling tight or restrictive. • The silhouette is gorgeous The ruched basque waist and ruffle hem give it that corset-style shape without the discomfort of an actual corset. It pulls everything in and smooths everything out — I felt instantly confident the moment I put it on. • Soft, stretchy, breathable fabric Seriously, the comfort level is next-level. I could wear this all night without tugging or adjusting anything. • Easy to dress up or down I’ve worn it with boots for a casual dinner and with heels for a night out or just sandals in the summer— all worked perfectly. It’s one of those rare dresses that can go from brunch to date night without missing a beat. Sizing Notes: The size chart is accurate. Stick with your usual size for a fitted, bodycon look. Bottom Line: If you want a dress that’s soft, flattering, and makes you feel like the most confident version of yourself, this one is a winner. I loved it so much I bought two — and honestly, I’m tempted to grab a third. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Christmas dress
items.body: Very pretty and fits great. Good quality. Read more
items.author: Stephanie F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!
items.body: Better than I expected! Material is thick, the dress is flattering. Will likely buy it in additional colors! Can dress up or down. In the photo I just happened to be wearing leggings, but for the winter I will probably pair it with fleece lined leggings. Read more
items.author: Joella M. Sweet

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and classy look
items.body: Just what I wanted. Ordering dresses online is always so iffy because you hardly ever get what you see or hope for. The thickness, quality and fit was exactly what I hoped for. Hides my imperfections and looks feminine and classy. I love the sexy short flirty swing of the dress. Read more
items.author: India Moss

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: I returned this dress the polyester was thick and cheap looking Read more
items.author: Brandy L. Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Flattering
items.body: Cute and very flattering. True to size. Soft to touch and very comfortable. Sits right above the knee, not too short. Has a little bit of a stretch and material is thick and not see through. Read more
items.author: Delilah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This dress has a great cut. It is instantly slimming because of the cinched waist and the flair bottom. My only complaint is that it difficult to iron out because it’s a sporty stretchy swimsuit material. Great fit/design without breaking the bank. Read more
items.author: Laura Fitch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: This dress was literally so cute! i got my normal size Med. And it was form fitting and adorable for the nutcracker. Super soft which was a little bit wrinkled when taking it out of the package, but I used a steamer to get it nice and smooth. It was perfect ! Read more
items.author: Samantha Rugne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Wine Red, White, Black, Coffee, Water Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
